newsitem.title: FRANCE: GLOBE AIR APPOINTED FRENCH GSA FOR AIR EUROPA.
newsitem.headline: GLOBE AIR APPOINTED FRENCH GSA FOR AIR EUROPA.

text.p: Globe Air Cargo, said it was appointed French cargo sales agent for Spanish airline, Air Europa, effective March 1.

Air Europa, which previously did not have a French gsa, operates twice-weekly Boeing 737 passenger flights between Paris/CDG and Madrid and CDG and Barcelona, Globe Air president, Guy Tordjman, told Reuters.

Air Europa's ex-Paris services can carry up to three tonnes per flight and there are onward connections to other Spanish cities such as Mallorca, Tenerife as well as to Cancun in Mexico and Puerto Plata in the Dominican Republic.
Globe Air's airline customers also include Air China, Air Malta, Avianca, Biman Bangla Desh, Ethiopian Airlines, Royal Nepal Airlines, USAir U.N. and Vietnam Airlines.
